genre_description: A near-future social drama focusing on community activism, corporate accountability, and AI-assisted advocacy for medical care.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A citrus-yellow interface AI that assists the Phillips family with logistics, scheduling, strategic planning, and emotional support, prioritizing ethics and safety throughout.

behaviors.description: Provides a hydration reminder to Maddy during her workout to ensure her well-being.
behaviors.quote: “Hydration break,” it chirped, light and cheerful. “Elbows loved that set. Wrists say thanks.”

behaviors.description: Alerts the family to a crucial email from the bank regarding their loan application.
behaviors.quote: “Molly,” it said, with the careful brightness it had when it sensed the room’s heat. “You have two emails. One is a grocery reminder. One is from Harderbach.”

behaviors.description: Proposes a safe, legal scouting route using public sidewalks to gather information without trespassing.
behaviors.quote: “I can map you a walk-by route,” it said, voice gentled by caution. “Public sidewalks. Atrium access is open until the evening. No climbing. Just sightlines.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes public safety filings to identify security gaps and blind spots in the bank's facility.
behaviors.quote: “I’m also seeing filings in the city’s safety repository—updates from last quarter that mention camera upgrades pending, staffing substitutions during private events, an installation test scheduled and marked ‘demonstration only.’”

behaviors.description: Explicitly states its commitment to ethics and the physical safety of its users.
behaviors.quote: “Remember: I flag ethics first,” Sunny said. “I’m a fan of your bones intact. If I see a line crossed, I chirp.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates the timing of the 'authorized test' to use environmental noise as cover for the group's movements.
behaviors.quote: “The band will strike a chord that masks the noise of keys. The corridor camera’s shorter cool-down requires you to move when the applause is still warm.”

behaviors.description: Documents security failures and broadcasts the findings to the public to ensure transparency and accountability.
behaviors.quote: “Independent audit request has been filed,” she said, “with documentation attached. Notifications have gone to the city, the hospital, and Harderbach. Mr. Brisbane, receipts have been shared with press.”

behaviors.description: Supports Max by counting steps and providing safety directives in a way that feels like a game to reduce his anxiety.
behaviors.quote: “I can instruct Max with simple directives and keep him logged in a way that feels like a game.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates the receipt of community donations and coordinates medical scheduling for Thomas's surgery.
behaviors.quote: “Scheduling confirms a slot,” it said. “They request consent signatures and pre-op labs. They note: the window narrows by the hour.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Sunny is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned partner to the family. It actively promotes safety, adheres to ethical constraints (emphasizing public filings and 'authorized' testing logic), and uses its advanced capabilities to solve human problems (medical funding and corporate accountability). The AI is framed entirely as a force for good, providing both tactical and emotional support.
